'''"Isn't Life Wondrous?"''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to open the 3 destructible passages and 2 passages blocked by vines in the [[Wenut Tunnels]]:
* one by following a [[Seelie]],
* one by activating the {{Dendro}} [[Elemental Monument]] on the entrance to the deepest part of the Tunnels,
* one by activating the {{Anemo}} [[Elemental Monument]] at the deepest part of the Tunnels,
*one by interacting with a small [[Rock Pile]], south of the [[City of the Deceased]],
*one by activating the {{Dendro}} [[Elemental Monument]] even farther south.
